Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2009 09:06AM kem123 wrote: Hi! Hope this finds doing well. I started my chemo 6/30 with TC. My SE are not so bad only diarrhea mild and altered taste in mouth. I was originally diagnosed with DCIS  4 years ago and had bilateral mastectomies thinking I had taken care of It.  This year told I had IDC in same breast on chest wall. Path report 2005 didn't show anything. < 1% chance. So I'm not sure how to stage. However my onc thought I should do chemo 6 cycles as well as radiation followed by tamoxifen. Right now, just feeling anxious about the road ahead.I'm off from work for 3 months. Hope your port went well,June bug40.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo June 2009 zuzeee zuzeee
